Class IfStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • t7.statements.IfStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Statement

    public class IfStatement
extends java.lang.Object
implements Statement
    Represents an If[-Else] Statement.
    Author:
    kinan

      • evaluateCondition

        public T7Boolean evaluateCondition(StatementHandler handler)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Evaluates the If condition, returns it as a Boolean.
        Parameters:
        handler - the statement handler encapsulating the state of the program.
        Returns:
        The result of evaluating the condition.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the if condition was of an illegal type.
